reviewText: If you are looking for a new Irish dance experience ~ do not purchase this.  It is the same show as Lord of the Dance, only more special effects and even skimpier costumes, but not half as good as Feet of Flames.  The dancers are wonderful, but doing the same routines to different tunes along the same story line ~ and the added effects are actually weird and slightly corny.
Bought as Christmas present for my wife. She loves it
Was a gift can't wait to watch it but I know it will be great love Lord of the Dance .

I was very disappointed in this . I own all of Michael Flatley,s dvds this one just didn't come
  close to the quality of the others. Celtic Tiger was absolutely tops. In Dangerous Games there wasn't the sparkle, excitement and story. So much of it was a poor repeat of the other dvds. I am absolutely a fan of Michael Flatley. I will add this one to my collection but will probably not watch it again.
Just what I expected! Great product

Sent back because we could not play it on a US DVD player
The write up should have said this.
Had to fight to get my points back

Michael Flatley doesn't dance throughout the show, just at the opening sequence on video with his son and at the end. This doesn't detract from the dancer who is The Lord of the Dance in this show. He does a great job and the female leads are also fantastic. The show is great no matter who dances in it!
Great show -  Michael Flatley does not dance in the whole show just at the end. The dancer in the show acts just like Michael Flatley, and is very good.
Have all of Michael Flatley's DVD's,this one is awesome just like the rest
My sister was very  happy to receive this gift.
